Ingredients.5: 5 dashes hot pepper sauce, or to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained and squeezed dry

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet, and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate. Chop when cool.

Directions.3: Fit pie crust into a 9-inch pie dish and set aside.

Directions.4: Whisk eggs, cream, hot pepper sauce, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper together in a bowl.

Directions.5: Spread spinach over the bottom of pie crust. Top with bacon, Cheddar cheese, and green onion; pour in egg mixture and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

Directions.6: Bake quiche in the preheated oven until the top is lightly puffed and browned, and a knife inserted into the center of the quiche comes out clean, 35 to 45 minutes.
